about_the_game:
To summarize, Blue Land is a 2D, Open World game, with a more chemistry-based twist on the survival genre.

PLOT
You find yourself in a world full of dangerous entities distilled from the periodic elements of our universe, brewed up by the essence of pure evil. Like tumors, your world is filled with little biomes, with elemental entities, ready to take your life. These entities may be harvested for elements of the periodic table, and may be crafted into fierce weapons, to aid you in facing harder and harder entities until you are finally ready for the final challenge; THE ELEMENTAL KING...

In Blue Land, you can fight the clock to try to get your fastest time, or you can explore and inquire ins and outs of the Blue Land World in this survival game.

In any case, you can
- Craft
- Fight
- Explore

The choice is yours...


Credits and Special Thanks to:
-Xiaoyi "Ethan" Pan (Ethanbaby66) - Artist
-FishUser - Musician

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features a unique and immersive system where various substances, including illegal drugs like steroids, unconventional items such as gasoline, and legal substances like cigarettes and strong alcohol, act as "potions." These items can either boost or negate specific player stats, adding a strategic layer to gameplay.

Additionally, players can discover hidden Easter eggs that lead to unexpected and sometimes fatal consequences for certain NPCs.

Like tumors, your world is filled with little biomes, with elemental entities, ready to take your life. These entities may be harvested for elements of the periodic table, and may be crafted into fierce weapons, to aid you in facing harder and harder entities until you are finally ready for the final challenge; THE ELEMENTAL KING...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2.5 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6
  • Processor: Intel 64 bit + Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2.5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Blue Land

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2.5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Craft, fight, explore! In this Open-World experience, you can do that all! The choice is yours...
